FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our toilet marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does your toilet marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our marketplace connects toilet buyers with sellers, offering a wide range of toilets from various brands and styles. Browse, compare, and purchase toilets easily through our platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What types of toilets do you offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a diverse selection including standard, low-flow, dual-flush, wall-hung, smart toilets, and more. Our inventory caters to residential, commercial, and specialized needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't directly offer installation, we can connect you with certified plumbers in your area who can professionally install your new toilet for an additional fee.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 30-day return policy for unopened, unused toilets in their original packaging. Custom or special order toilets may have different return terms. Please check the product page for specific details.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Many of our toilets are designed with water conservation in mind. We offer a range of low-flow and dual-flush options that can help reduce water usage and lower your environmental impact.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Toilet Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of toilets are available on your marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our marketplace offers a wide range of toilets, including standard flush toilets, composting toilets, smart toilets, and luxury models. We cater to both residential and commercial needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the ordering and delivery process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Simply select your desired toilet, add it to your cart, and proceed to checkout. We offer nationwide shipping, and most orders are delivered within 5-7 business days. For larger items, we also provide installation services.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do you offer any warranties or guarantees?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, all toilets come with a manufacturer's warranty. We also offer a 30-day return policy if you're not satisfied with your purchase. Additionally, we provide an extended warranty option for added peace of mind.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I get expert advice before making a purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Our team of toilet experts is available via chat, phone, or email to answer any questions you may have about our products. We can help you choose the perfect toilet for your needs and budget.
